Package datafu.pig.bags

Class Summary
AliasBagFields Re-alias the fields inside of a bag.
AppendToBag Appends a tuple to a bag.
BagConcat Concatenates the tuples from a set of bags, producing a single bag containing all tuples.
BagSplit Splits a bag of tuples into a bag of bags, where the inner bags collectively contain the tuples from the original bag.
CountEach This UDF takes an input bag and generates a count of the number of times each distinct tuple appears.
DistinctBy Get distinct elements in a bag by a given set of field positions.
Enumerate Enumerate through a bag, replacing each (elem) with (elem, idx).
FirstTupleFromBag Returns the first tuple from a bag.
NullToEmptyBag UDF that, if the input is null, returns an empty bag; otherwise, returns the input bag unchanged.
PrependToBag Prepends a tuple to a bag.
ReverseEnumerate Enumerate through a bag, replacing each (elem) with (elem, idx).
UnorderedPairs Generates pairs of all items in a bag.
WeightedSample Create a new bag by performing a weighted sampling without replacement from the input bag.
